basecamp_flint_hills.author: Linden Moore
basecamp_flint_hills.comment: My favorite place to stay on the Flint Hills Trail!. I have camped under the stars alone, met new people, camped in large groups, and even slept in the comfort of the Sleep Shack. I highly recommend staying here when exploring Bushong to Council Grove.

bushong_restroom.author: Linden Moore
bushong_restroom.comment: It may just be a pit toilet, but it was the first pit toilet on the trail. I took pictures with it, featured it in videos, and I think this toilet deserves to be honored.
